Description: This publication provides the most timely picture available of people using NHS funded secondary mental health, learning disabilities and autism services in England. These are experimental statistics which are undergoing development and evaluation.
Name: Mental Health Services Monthly Statistics
Notes: This publication provides the most timely picture available of people using NHS funded secondary mental health, learning disabilities and autism services in England. These are experimental statistics which are undergoing development and evaluation.
Route from landing page to data: Data on this page identified via a link at top of page under heading Summary then Latest version. This will link to another page with the latest data, identified on page under heading Resources as a series of tables in XLS and CSV format.
Sizing Notes: Several XLS tables contained in quarter info. Multiple dimensions with subdimensions and several footnotes. Tables have differeing dimensional structures. CSV tables cover single months and are simple in structure and complexity.
